info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 8:54AM EST until further notice by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Virginia... Allen Creek near Boydton affecting Mecklenburg County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Allen Creek near Boydton. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Water begins to flow over the bridge over Allen Creek on Hayes Mill Rd. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 18.0 feet. - Bankfull stage is 13.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:30 AM EST Wednesday was 19.9 feet. - Forecast...The river will continue to fall through this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage tonight. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 18.1 feet on 12/12/2008. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 900 PM EST.
